entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 20 April 2023
